description: Get size chart list for Seller app

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to endpoint auth operation is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, using to identify your permission to the api, need for common account system

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api and timestamp

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: test_chart
response_fields.description: If test, some test rules. You value need to in test related value
